source:
%%sql
MERGE INTO crm_sanctioneddb.dim_geography AS target
USING (
    SELECT 
        G.new_counrtyid as Geography_id_nk,
        G.new_name as Chemonics_Location,
        hash(G.new_counrtyid, COALESCE(G.new_name, '~')) AS Audit_Hash_Cd,
        G.IsActive
    FROM crm_query.new_counrty G
    WHERE G.IsActive = 1 AND G.new_counrtyid IS NOT NULL
) AS source
ON (target.Geography_id_nk = source.Geography_id_nk AND target.IsActive = 1)
WHEN MATCHED AND target.Audit_Hash_Cd <> source.Audit_Hash_Cd THEN
    UPDATE SET 
        Effective_End_Date = current_date(),
        IsActive = 0,
        Chemonics_Location = source.Chemonics_Location,
        Date_Updated_Last = current_date(),
        Updated_By = current_user()
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        Geography_id_nk,
        Geography_desc_nk,
        Chemonics_Location,
        Audit_Hash_Cd,
        IsActive,
        effective_start_date,
        effective_end_date,
        Date_Created,
        Date_Updated_Last,
        Created_By,
        Updated_By
    )
    VALUES (
        source.Geography_id_nk,
        '',
        source.Chemonics_Location,
        source.Audit_Hash_Cd,
        1,
        current_date(),
        '9999-12-31',
        current_date(),
        current_date(),
        current_user(),
        current_user()
    )
